text: I actually think if you want to be a career teacher, I would recommend doing a traditional certification. You technically have a coach while in TFA, but the level of support you actually get totally depends on your region/school/coach. I think I met with my coach three times my first year, and it was not helpful. BUT, if you are interested in education as a field (beyond classroom teaching), then TFA does have a great network and a ton of opportunities and fellowships for alum to get you into more policy and advocacy roles
